# Inferring clusters of orthologous and paralogous transcripts``Algorithm to infer clusters of isoorthologous transcripts using gene-level homology relationships and a Reciprocal Best Hits approach``![-----------------------------------------------------](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andreasbm/readme/master/assets/lines/rainbow.png)

About The Project

Overview

`A graph-based method to infer isoorthology & recent paralogy relations in a set of homologous transcripts`---

Requirements

* __`python3 (at leat python 3.6)`__* __`NetworkX`__* __`Pandas`__* __`Numpy`__* __`ETE toolkit`__![-----------------------------------------------------](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/andreasbm/readme/master/assets/lines/rainbow.png)

About the package

``install the package``
pip3 install transcriptorthology
``import package and use the main function``
from transcriptorthology.transcriptOrthology import inferring_transcripts_isoorthologyif __name__ == '__main__':  gtot_path = './execution/mapping_gene_to_transcripts/ENSGT00390000003967.fasta'  gt_path = './execution/NHX_trees/ENSGT00390000003967.nhx'  lower_bound = 0.7  transcripts_msa_path = './execution/transcripts_alignments/ENSGT00390000003967.alg'  tsm_value = 1  output_folder = './execution/output_folder'    inferring_transcripts_isoorthology(transcripts_msa_path, gtot_path, gt_path,tsm_value,lower_bound,output_folder)
